name: Goblin Den
creatures: Goblin Minion, Goblin Warrior, Goblin Boss, Goblin Hexer
roomDescription: A small band of goblins lie in wait to ambush intruders entering Undermountain.
dmDescription: The goblins are cowardly and will flee if their boss is killed first. They have set up crude traps near the entrance.
aiRoomPrompt: A small basement room, underneath a typical home in Waterdeep that has been turned into a goblin den. The floor is wooden but covered in debris, including a small area in the southeast corner of the room that has been barricaded off with crates, barrels and broken furniture. A few torches on the walls provide dim light.

name: Tiger's Den
roomDescription: A Waterdavian noble's exotic pet Tiger has gotten loose and is roaming the dungeon. Kill it to ensure it doesn't hurt anyone or capture and return it for a reward!
dmDescription: The tiger is hungry and aggressive. A DC 15 Animal Handling check can calm it enough to capture it alive.

name: Bugbear Abduction
roomDescription: A pair of Bugbears hunt adventurers to abduct and bring back to their lair.
dmDescription: These bugbears work for a larger organization. They will attempt to knock players unconscious rather than kill them.

name: Toss Me
roomDescription: A broken bridge over a bottomless pit tests the parties jumping ability. I hope they brought a rope... 2 doors across the chasm for better rewards, 1 door on your side for a hard fight.
dmDescription: DC 12 Athletics check to jump across (with running start). DC 15 without. Rope and grappling hook makes it automatic. The pit is 30 feet deep, not bottomless.

name: Troll Bridge
roomDescription: A bored Troll charges a toll of 10gp to cross his bridge, but will gladly smash anyone who won't pay.
dmDescription: The troll can be persuaded to lower the toll with a DC 13 Persuasion check. He's lonely and will chat for a reduced toll.

name: Three Boxes
roomDescription: The classic parlor puzzle from the Blue Prince: https://blue-prince.fandom.com/wiki/Parlor_Puzzle
dmDescription: Three boxes with inscriptions. Only one contains the key to proceed. The inscriptions are riddles that hint at the correct box.

name: Goblin Warband
creatures: Goblin Minion, Goblin Warrior, Goblin Boss, Goblin Hexer
roomDescription: A goblin warband lies in wait to ambush intruders develing deeper into Undermountain.
dmDescription: This larger warband is more organized and greedy. They will negotiate if offered enough gold (50gp+).

name: Goblins!!!
creatures: Goblin Minion, Goblin Warrior, Goblin Boss, Goblin Hexer
roomDescription: An elite goblin strike force defends its territory deep within Undermountain
dmDescription: This is a well-trained goblin elite unit. They use tactics and will not flee. The boss has a magic item.

name: Wyrmling Lair
creatures: [dragon type] Dragon Wyrmling, Kobold, Winged Kobold
roomDescription: A dragon wyrmling has gathered a band of kobolds to help it amass a hoard.
dmDescription: The kobolds worship the wyrmling and will fight to the death. The wyrmling is young and arrogant. Small hoard worth 200gp.

name: Adult Dragon Lair
roomDescription: An ancient dragon rests in its lair, surrounded by centuries of accumulated treasure.
dmDescription: The dragon is ancient and cunning. It may negotiate, trade information, or attack depending on the party's approach. Massive hoard worth 50,000gp+.
